H0.text: what artistic style did henri rousseau work in. Naive Art

H1.text: what artistic style did henri rousseau work in. Fauvism

H2.text: what artistic style did henri rousseau work in. Surrealism

H3.text: what artistic style did henri rousseau work in. Post-Impressionism

A4.text: He was a French post-Impressionist painter in the Naïve or Primitive manner.

A5.text: Henri Rousseau (1844–1910) was a French Post-Impressionist who was discovered by Pablo Picasso.

A6.text: One particularly influential painter of 'naïve art' was Henri Rousseau (1844–1910).
